item.description:
To help Support the troops and their families. Essex St. Whitman VFW, Registration 9 - 10:30, ride leaves at 11, Meal at 12:30. $20 per rider, $10 for passengers/walk-ins. Music and Raffles, too. Call Maureen 781-545-3702 or Joe 617-821-5299
Many of our active military families are struggling with so many things; the hardships of separation and loss of financial income are two of the biggest concerns. We support our armed forces by sending care packages; lets support those who are left behind, too.
item.name: VFW "Unmet Needs" Project
